allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Supabase authentication with daily download limits

- Add AuthGate component for login/signup flow
- Track resume downloads per user \(5 free per day\)
- Auto-reset download count every 24 hours
- Show daily limit message when limit reached
- Add loading states and visual feedback to download buttons
- Cover letter download is optional but counts toward limit
- Integrate Supabase client with environment variables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/andrewellis/Desktop/ats-tailor commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add secure backend proxy and rebrand to Forapply

- Create Express backend server to handle Claude API calls securely
- Move Anthropic API key to server-side only \(no longer exposed in browser\)
- Add rate limiting \(10 requests/min per IP\) and input validation
- Update landing page branding to "Welcome to Forapply"
- Update header and daily limit messaging
- Add Vite proxy config for /api routes
- Create .env.example with documented environment variables
- Update README with new architecture and setup instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Vercel serverless functions for API endpoints

Fixes 404 error on production by converting Express server
to Vercel serverless functions that work with static hosting.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(bash -c 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 22 && npm run dev')

Bash(bash -c 'source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 22 >/dev/null 2>&1 && node -e ""import\(\\""dotenv\\""\).then\(d => { d.config\(\); console.log\(\\""ANTHROPIC_API_KEY loaded:\\"", !!process.env.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY\); console.log\(\\""PORT:\\"", process.env.PORT\); }\)""')
